title: Game Culture and Play-Based Science Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theories and general understanding of gaming culture
context.additional_context: Need for mobile-optimized content and gamified educational design integrated with smartphone accessibility considerations

learning_goals: Learners can apply game mechanics (e.g., quests, reward systems) to explain scientific concepts.
Learners can experiment with and analyze complex scientific principles through play-based activities (digital/analog).
Learners can propose three or more engagement strategies for instructional design based on game culture research.

resources: Interactive content for low-spec mobile devices
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
